I met him in 1988, I sat with him for five or ten minutes in the Blue Room when I was a candidate for Congress. What I was most struck by, in our brief encounter, was his humility and his gentleness. As we go forward, it is imperative that we are tough on policy, but decent to our political opponents. Turning to current affairs, Mike Pence says conservatives should not give up on repealing Obamacare.
